attributes.action: Make Amazon pay the shopping bag fee for their plastic shipping/shopping bags.
attributes.background:
Retail giant Amazon are being criticised by customers for increasing use of plastic packaging.

While UK supermarkets and shops try to use less plastic, Amazon earlier this year introduced a new range of padded plastic envelopes for deliveries.

Amazon are using plastic bags to deliver shopping.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259176
